Description: 1998 PRS Custom 22! Flame Red Quilt "10 Top"! Made In USA! Thisis really cool. You are looking at a 1998 PRS Custom 22. This is an upgradedmodel with the "10 Top" This is a beautiful Flame Red Quilt Top thathas a number "10" on the back of the headstock designating this asthe PRS 10 Top. This guitar also has the "Birds in Flight" on thefretboard. It really is the complete package. FromThe Web: TheCustom 22 is a 22-fret version of the classic PRS Custom 24. Like the Custom24, the Custom 22 uses a Mahogany body with a curly Maple top and is outfittedwith stylish bird inlays. Like most high-end PRS guitars, the Custom 22 wasoffered with a number of custom finishes and specifications. Yearsof Production: 1993 - 2009, 2012 - present Body Style: Double cutaway solidbody Wood Composition: Mahogany body, Flamed/Quilted Maple top, Rosewoodfingerboard Design Elements: Bird inlays, single-piece bridge/tailpiece, 25-inchscale length, two humbuckers Notable PRS Players: Carlos Santana, Mark Tremonti, Al DiMeola SerialNumber: #836954 Weight: 7.20lbs. TheCustom 22 is the work horse of the Paul Reed Smith line up. This is a Hard TailBridge. Slim Taper Neck. Easy to play and sounds great. "Pro Level"Guitar. Cosmetics: ExcellentCondition. Some very light strumming scratches on the front. A few lightscratches on the back of the body but nothing any where near to be consideredbuckle rash. Probably could be buffed out with a little effort. Neck, Fretboardand Headstock in great shape. Hard Shell Case has some scuffs,scratches and minor tears in the tolex. All latches work. It is used. Notperfect. All the "Mojo" and than some. Look at the pictures closely.
Title: Paul Reed Smith 1998 Custom 22 Ten Top Red Quilted Top Great Condition
